Again prayer is made, and again the Deacon raises his voice and bids the faithful, each where he stands, to bow the head, and the Bishop likewise blesses the faithful. Thus the Dismissal takes place at the Anastasis, and one by one all draw near to the Bishop's hand. Afterwards the Bishop is conducted from the Anastasis to the Cross with hymns, all the people accompanying him, and when he arrives he first says a prayer, then he blesses the catechumens, then another prayer is said and he blesses the faithful.
